CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 127mm Javelin FGM
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 127mm Javelin Fire-and-Forget Guided Missile, efficient for both bunker and tank busting, very deadly and accurate medium missile.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 50mm Type 89 HE
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 50mm Type 89 High Explosive round with impact fuse, small size like hand grenade, cause small explosive blast filled with fragments.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Type 99(Kai) Frag Grenade(D)
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Type 99(Kai) Frag Grenade with propellant base to make it capable to lauch from the Grenade Discharger, which provide far better effective range and projectile speed but in direct fire due the timed grenade fuse doesn't do that well in high-arcing ballistic trajectories indirect fire.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 50mm Type 89 Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 50mm Type 89 Incendiary round with impact fuse, doesn't contain that much incendiary material as standard mortar round but is enough to destroy/damage small structures/fortification.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 50mm Type 95 Smoke
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 50mm Type 95 Smoke round with timed fuse, contain 0.11kg of HC type smoke mixture to produce a decent size of smoke screen.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 20mm FFMR HE
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 20mm Fliegerfaust High Explosive mini rocket, cause small explosive blast, very effective counter soft/light armored target.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: 20mm FFMR HEI
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: 20mm Fliegerfaust High Explosive-Incendiary mini rocket, cause small explosive blast, detonate a small incendiary sub-munition after impact, very effective counter flammable target.
